title: Definition of average rate of change
text: The average rate of change is the change in $$y$$ values divided by the change in $$x$$ values

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: We can input $$2$$ and $$4$$ into the function. What are its results?

title: Difference between points
text: We can subtract f(2) from f(4) and divide by $$(4-2)$$. This gives us $$\frac{\frac{63}{4}-\frac{7}{2}}{4-2}$$.
